summary: During the inaugural party of one of the largest malls in Asia, a newly recruited security guard must work to stop a supernatural threat.
cast: Jimmy Sheirgill|Nushrat Bharucha|Arif Zakaria|Vikram Raj Bhardwaj|Geet Sharma|Asif Basra|Nivedita Bhattacharya|Shradha Kaul|Pramod Pathak|Yoshika Verma|Neeraj Khetrapal|Neeraj Sood|Charlotte Desmond|Rahul Mishra|Vishal Jehtwa|Anadya Sharma|Danish Akhtar|Bhagwan Dass
title: Darr @ the Mall
